data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Gautam Buddha Nagar to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Lakhera people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Lakhera people know you.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Gautam Buddha Nagar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
